short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces your new tab page with a minimalistic clock and beautiful backgrounds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bored of your start page? Want something simple and beautiful while adding a new tab or starting your browser? With Tabscape, you get a breath of fresh air every time. A new background will automatically fade in every 5 minutes and you can choose your own theme by typing in your own keywords. Tabscape will search through Unsplash's collection of photos and randomly pick a new background that fits your keywords.
